VariableDescription.Name: BurstTableID
VariableDescription.LongDescription: ID of the IMPACT Burst Table
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         STP>Solar Terrestrial Probes
#     SOURCE_NAME                     stb>Solar Terrestrial Relations Observatory Behind of the Sun-Earth Line
#     DISCIPLINE                      Solar Physics>Heliospheric Physics
#     DATA_TYPE                       L1>Level 1
#     DESCRIPTOR                      IMPACT_BURST>Burst Criteria
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     PI_NAME                         J. Luhmann
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  UCB/SSL
#     TEXT                            The file contains burst criteria values from the IMPACT instrument on the STEREO                       
#                                      Behind spacecraft.                                                                                    
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Plasma and Solar Wind
#     MISSION_GROUP                   STEREO
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  stb_l1_impact_burst-criteria

#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      STEREO Behind IMPACT Burst Criteria.
#     LINK_TEXT                       Experiment and Data descriptions for STEREO/IMPACT
#     LINK_TITLE                      STEREO/IMPACT PI Site
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://sprg.ssl.berkeley.edu/impact
#     FILE_NAMING_CONVENTION          source_datatype_descriptor
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time since 0 AD
#       NOTES:  Interval-centered time tag
#  2. ID of the IMPACT Burst Table
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 22:08:05 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. ID of the IMPACT Burst Table
#
